reviewText: Will play on North American players, even though it was produced in the UK. Loveable Bridget in a two-pack.
Cute packaging! It's a steal, trust me!
DVDs will not play in a United States DVD player
I would give it zero stars if I could. It really should mention that the DVD won't play in the US. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!!

Don't be tricked into buying this DVD set because of the affordable price...what they don't emphasize is that you will be unable to view if your DVD/Blu-ray Player is Standard (Standard is "Region 1" -USA) versus another less popular or "Region 2" (UK) DVD/Blu-ray player.

Don't be surprising screwed like I was. SUPER DISAPPOINTED to be misled just so one would be forced to spend more money to either return product (S&H Charges are more than the bloody DVD set), OR buy yet another hard to find Regional DVD Player that is being phased out. Pathetic.
Love these movies. They are hilarious and great entertainment still today. I wanted to purchase these movies to review prior to watching the new movie Bridget Jones Baby
Great movie. Arrived just as advertised.
Arrived damaged case,  worked but scuff marks on DVD due to busted case
